attributes.action: Allow all mobile home residents to have a pet dog
attributes.background: As long as they dont bark all the time, are kept on a lead when walking in the site and doggy poo picked up.

rejection.details:
Regulations on mobile home sites are the responsibility of the site owners. 

If you would like it to be against the law for site owners/operators to ban residents from keeping dogs as pets, you could start a petition asking for that.
